title: Unmanned Wireless Penetration Testing Device
description: 2nd-place senior capstone (2 / 50 teams) that automates wireless recon and penetration-testing from an autonomous quadcopter.

title: News Sentiment Embeddings for Stock Price Forecasting
description: Transformer-based NLP model that learns sentiment vectors from financial-news headlines to predict next-day S&P 500 movement.

title: FFT-on-FPGA Learning Tool
description: Hand-coded Verilog FFT core with interactive demo; published at IEEE ISEC 2025.

title: Word and Character Counter
description: Demonstrating proficiency in being able to manipulate, read, and derive properties of strings.

title: Password Generator
description: Demonstrating proficiency in being able to generate random passwords by using effective random modules to generate a secure password.

title: Quadratic Equation Generator
description: Demonstrating proficiency in generating quadratic equations of all forms for the benefit of any user wanting to learn all about quadratic equations.

title: Image to ASCII Converter
description: Demonstrating proficiency in converting image files into ASCII text art using open-source JavaScript libraries.

title: World City Map
description: Demonstrating proficiency in plotting CSV coordinates of various global cities using open-source JavaScript libraries.

title: Rutgers IEEE Micromouse
description: Part of a team that secured 1st place in all categories at the NYIT-Long Island Micromouse Competition. Worked on the maze-solving algorithm.

title: Bandpass Filter Design for Dynamic Signal Demultiplexing
description: Built a bandpass filter with a 10 dB gain used for signal demultiplexing in radio and Morse-code transmissions.

title: Intel SGX Demonstration
description: Demonstrating proficiency in running a digital wallet with SGX and executing the SGX program in hardware mode.

title: Virtual TPM Demonstration
description: Demonstrating proficiency in running TPM commands to read PCR values on a TPM 2.0 simulator.

title: MunchMate
description: A comprehensive platform for browsing restaurants, placing orders, interacting with reviews, and more, featuring a GPT-powered chatbot for real-time food recommendations.

title: Morse Code
description: A tool to learn and transcribe Morse Code in real time, emulating real behavior and outputting shareable transcripts.

title: Bank Account Management System
description: A bank account management system written in Java. Implemented insertion sort for in-place display, improving times by 85 %.

title: Event Calendar Management System
description: Command-line event-calendar software that improved room-booking efficiency by 50 % across multiple campus locations using Java.

title: QR Code
description: A QR-code generator.

title: Album Maker
description: Build albums of people from a directory of photos using machine-learning facial recognition.

title: YouTube-USB
description: Encode and decode data to and from the MPEG-4 video format losslessly. Accompanying paper attached.

title: PrivateGPT ChatBot
description: A GPT-based research-focused LLM designed to answer inquiries about its training data. Runs locally using PyTorch and Electron.

title: Marketplace Messenger
description: A Chromium extension that reminds users to stay mindful before entering online marketplaces. Published on the Chrome Web Store.

title: General Conversion Tools
description: Conversion tools such as DOCX → HTML and conversions between hexadecimal, octal, binary and decimal. Written in React, Preact, and Vite.

title: 3D Fidget Spinner
description: A 3D fidget spinner made using Three.js, Vue, and Vite.

title: 3D Taurus
description: A 3D spinning torus made with Three.js, Vue, and Vite as an introductory demo for 3D visualization.

title: Percent Off Calculator
description: A tool for quickly calculating discounted prices.

title: Tool for Engineering Economics
description: A tool for calculating interest, principals, and other values, adapted from Rutgers University’s Engineering Economics coursework.

title: Tetris
description: A faithful Tetris clone.

title: Fidget Spinner Simulation
description: A simple, browser-based fidget spinner app.

title: Mental Math Practice
description: An elegant app for refining mental-math skills.

title: Double Pendulum Simulation
description: A JavaScript double-pendulum simulation demonstrating chaotic motion in an interactive manner.

title: Conway's Game of Life
description: Conway’s Game of Life written in WebGPU, initializing a random board at startup.

title: Chess Board Bot
description: A simple chess board with an AI opponent featuring dynamic difficulty.

title: Sudoku Solver
description: A Sudoku-solving site that uses recursive tree search to produce a valid solution.

title: Visual Novel Demo
description: The beginning of a visual-novel story coded in Ren’Py.

title: Kodesmos
description: Turns an image or series of images into a video signal that can be reconstructed with minimal processing power.

title: 9 CO2 Compartment Estimating
description: Provides numeric approximations of CO₂ per lung compartment using minimal equipment.
